website_summaries.verdict: If you have a large nursery and prefer an appliance with a long run time, this humidifier with nightlight is an apt choice.
pros: Choose between cool or warm mist settings
Shuts off when tank is empty
cons: It's pricier than some other choices, and it may be too much humidifier for some baby bedrooms

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This machine is okay. I don't like it because you have to flip it over to fill. Having trouble with it keeping the humidity at 50% in our ND winter's. It's quiet! I haven't cleaned it yet as I just got in less than a week ago. I got this to replace a "mainstay" brand I had had for 3 years. I'm thinking I will have to buy another of these or try another brand to keep with my Mainstay brand.
customer_reviews.author: C. Raeshke

customer_reviews.title: I only used this machine a few times (maybe 4-5) ...
customer_reviews.text: I only used this machine a few times (maybe 4-5) and it started sparking flames in my baby's nursery- thankfully I was in there. I also found alot of hidden black mildew/mold in it. The top part that allows you to point where the mist comes out melted as well. I am very very dissatisfied with this and it doesn't appear I am able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Claire

customer_reviews.title: No warm mist - misleading ad
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wanted to like this product but it failed me twice. For a humidifier, this was on the quiet side but main reasons I disliked was that this had both cold and warm humidifier features. After using this product for only 2-3 days, no warm steam at all. This ad is misleading. Also, after using for half the day, the inside fills with water. I first had thought the product I received may have been broken so I ordered a replacement, but nonetheless, the replacement humidifier was leaking inside as well. Also, after leaving it on the warm mist, there was a small burn mark inside when I lifted the tank. Overall, I would give this product zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jinhee

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again!  $74.00 wasted.
customer_reviews.text: Cumbersome to removed and refill. Supposed to offer warm as well as cool mist. No warmth occurs. Bought a different brand that is top fill - much easier. When it's empty, the top lifts out and then needs to be turned over to fill; requires a pitcher to refill and then when returning the filled portion to the base, it's bulky to handle as you're flipping it over to settle into the base. Stupid design. Also, supposed to run 100 hours; no way that happens.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the PureGuardian Ultrasonic humidifier for my nursery. I purposely bought this one because it had both the cool/warm mist feature. I was very disappointed that when I put it on the warm mist feature-cool air came out. I feel like this product is misleading because it is advertised as both. I could have spent less money for a humidifier, but I figured that this one would be worth it because it would also heat the room up. If you're looking for a warm mist humidifier, don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best humidifier I have ever had or dealt with. If your house is starting to get alot of static electricity you can turn this on full blast, and in no time it will go away. It does have a lot of mist it shoots into the air on full blast, so you KNOW it is working. later on i turn it down to a low setting and it works great for my small house. If I ever need another or know a friend that needs a humidifier, I 100% recommend it. Easy to fill up, and holds a lot of water.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kenworthy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after four months.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this humidifier and it put out a good amount of moisture. It says it was warm air, but never got that warm. My issue is that I purchased it in December and it stopped working in April. First it began leaking. I would wake up with a puddle on the floor and then it stopped working all together. The motor wouldn’t even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: MTMom

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good..
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it a week, but already I can see it's much better than the one I had before. The tank must be removed to fill, but once filled and capped it does NOT leak until it's back on the main unit. Output is good. Very fine mist, so very little dampness around the unit. I'll see how it's doing in a year or so, but.. so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: KC Rave

customer_reviews.title: Great brand! No filter required! It’s my 2nd.
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand especially since they don’t require a filter. This model is smaller than my last one and is a bit clumsier to handle. They only put a handle on one side compared to my old larger one. They added a “mist” to this model, so beware. I walked into mom’s room one day, and it was like a spa...foggy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I purchased it November 2015 and it's now February 2019 - still running strong! The only thing that broke is the light feature, which I could care less about. It's super easy to clean and I haven't had a leaking problem. When it is turned on high, the water reservoir needs to be refilled every 24 hours or so, which can get annoying but I typically don't have it running on high too often. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only do we love this humidifier, the company is wonderful as well. We've had this humidifier for about 2 years. It's quiet, great capacity and the output is perfect (with either heat or cool cycle). I'm mainly writing this review to rate the company's customer service. We lost the lid to the humidifier. It's lost due to moving or our toddler. I called to purchase a replacement and it is being shipped free of charge. Who even does that in this day and age? I'm happy with the humidifier AND amazed at customer care. We will definitely be a repeat customer as we will need two more once we move.
customer_reviews.author: Nanny Goat

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of cantankerous...if too much water is in the base it doesn't like to start, as most humidifiers. Also the warm setting isn't all that warm...It's very quiet. It would be nice if you could fill the tank all the way and use it for the 100hrs it says..I'm sure if I made sure the bas wasn't too full I could, but it last through the night and into the morning so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: here shopping

customer_reviews.title: Steam does not last 100 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier on Jan. 26, 2020. I have it in my kitchen which is where I spend a great deal of time. The water container while full is heavy to place on the base and it runs out of water in approximately 22 hours. Not sure where the 100 hours fits into the description. I have already had to clean the base steam opening as it would turn off and say NO WATER. However, the container was full of water. For the price I would not consider purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: self cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a humidifier that is self cleaning. My husband needs it by the bed for his compromised weak lungs. We live in the desert and this is great for a dry environment .
customer_reviews.author: Maui Chin Chin

customer_reviews.title: No warm mist, false advertising.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a second one after the first one got too old or used or something. Neither one of them gave out warm mist so I don't know why they say it will. As I have no heat in my bedroom, and it's winter now, I'll send this one back. I had also kind of forgotten what a hassle it is to refill because you have to take it apart and take it to the sink to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: Kmarvin

customer_reviews.title: Love this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidifier! You can turn the light on or off depending on what you're comfortable with and I feel it is very quiet, just a soft, soothing hum. It really resists mold and scale, stays so clean. Very easy to maintain. The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because there is absolutely no difference between the cool air setting and warm air setting. You're only going to get cool air out of this. The company should either make that function work or not pretend to have it. But, I am happy with this appliance and would buy another for my son's room if he needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vinecour

customer_reviews.title: One of the best humidifiers I've purchased within the past decade
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best humidifiers I've purchased within the past decade, which actually works. Only cons, setting this to a setting showing a visible mist, then causes a white power to form on everything including computer inlet draft fans. So set to only half-way or less. Also, the no-water sensor device sometimes malfunctions. I simply just jiggle the tank or clean-out the ports with vinegar to apparently fix.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent! Been using this product ever since I bought it. The cool mist plus the warm mist features are the best purifier features ever.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Lane jr

customer_reviews.title: A Big Improvement
customer_reviews.text: This vaporizer is much better than my previous one, a Vicks. It's quiet, easy to fill, and the buttons are easy to operate. I haven't had it that long, but I have no reason to believe that it will not give me adequate service. The water reservoir has to be refilled more frequently than advertised, but it's a minor annoyance, which shouldn't detract from its excellent performance. I'm totally satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert1976

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: We have had their products for years and they work great! One finally died after 10 years of service. Bought a new one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's tough to say that this is a 100 hr running machine! It does keep the humidity, BUT it doesn't cover much sq. footage. I had it in my upstair, about 600 sq. ft., it was running on high all day to keep the moderate amount of humidity! It was okay, but I prefer the Aircare EP9 800 whole house humidifier. JFYI.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, use during winter, store rest of year. Last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 2nd one of these when and old (different version) one finally quit running properly. Add water once per day. Two seem to keep the main rooms (bedroom & kitchen) moisture high enough to not have dry hands, etc. Use only during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Pumps out tons of most.
customer_reviews.text: Pumps out tons of mist. Container works for 12 hours before you need to refill it.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and noiseless
customer_reviews.text: Went with the 1.5 gal, glad I did as it is rather large, easy to assemble, fits nicely on a side table, heated up quickly completed noiseless
customer_reviews.author: Bney O

customer_reviews.title: Not very warm
customer_reviews.text: It is a very wonderful product with the exception that warm mist does not come out very warm at all. The tank heats up but the warm mist is more towards cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Debray

customer_reviews.title: the absolute best
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have had many humidifiers over the years- this is the absolute best. It does the job and its so, so quiet. The others used to wake me up due to the noise. And we've had it a while and it doesn't leak, unlike the two Vicks brand humidifiers, both of which leaked within a a month of purchase..It does have a light on the knob, but we turn the control panel to the wall, and that eliminates the problem
customer_reviews.author: CSB

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This humidifier has saved my staticky hair from winter breakage. We have vaulted ceilings and a loft above our bedroom and this humidifier does a fantastic job of keeping enough moisture in the air so I am not getting shocked and I can brush my hair. That's really all I want from it. We fill it at night and it runs about 10 hours. It runs very quietly.
customer_reviews.author: LJ McW

customer_reviews.title: ok unit, dont expect 100 hours of run time on a fill up.
customer_reviews.text: 100 run time, hahaha. We fill it 2 or 3 times a day. What a pain to fill, you need to flip it over and hold it under the sink, it won't sit flat for fill up due to the steam vents on top. It would be nice to fill from the top without removing the water tank, oh well ;( otherwise it works well and puts the moisture in the air and is fairly quiet except some glug gouging as the water is used up.
customer_reviews.author: Rwgems

customer_reviews.title: It has helped us both breathe better with air or heater on in house
customer_reviews.text: We use distilled water in ours all the time. It never puts out any dust and rarely needs cleaning. It has helped us both breathe better with air or heater on in house. We both we're having sinus problems when laying down to sleep. No more!! I did notice that my skin changed in the when we used the heater in house. It seemed much dryer but that has stopped too. Having it running in the room while we sleep has been enough to help with both skin and sinus issues. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Klingborg

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...stop working after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this product. Bought last year and stop working. Instead the one I bought 4 years back standard Vicks humidifier still works
customer_reviews.author: Swapnil

customer_reviews.title: Fill at night and it lasts until next night!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tap water leaves pink slime, not really in tank, but more in the path of the mist and all in the area where you fill the tank. And speaking of filling the tank, my next one will be a top fill !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, quiet
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Does not run 100 hrs without refill. Also refill opening is on the bottom of the unit ,so when refilling unit you cannot lay unit on flat surface as mist mechanism is under it. Therefore you find yourself holding unit as it fills with 1 1/2 gallons of water. Very heavy and cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Long Island lady

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but then broke!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this humidifier when I got it. It worked great in the beginning. Has a blue nightlight and adjustable mist. I recently refilled the tank and water came out from the electronic part on the bottom! Was spilling everywhere and I do not know why... now looking for a new humidifier and it won't be this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: We really like this humidifier. Our previous PureGuardian worked for a number of years but finally we had to replace it. This one is even better, quieter, and it generates more mist. The water tank is easier to take on and off too. It produces enough mist foe a good size room.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it as it worked for about 15 minutes and then quit-- --have owned the very same one before--and--was very happy with that one--which I got elsewhere-- so--was extremely disappointed about this
customer_reviews.author: very unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier twice. The first unit would stop emitting mist and the red light would ready out of water when the tank was full. I exchanged it in hopes that it was a fluke and the 2nd unit would work properly. The 2nd unit had the same problem. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Madelyn Ulrich

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: The button to select the amount of spray (low-medium-high) is the same.
customer_reviews.author: MEMEME

customer_reviews.title: The only thing missing is information on.......
customer_reviews.text: Out performs most of the humidifiers I've had to purchase over the years because of hard water. There's an optional filter you can purchase to key the white scale residue at a manageable level. The only complaint is there no information on the life of the filter.
customer_reviews.author: TravelmanXS

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this humidifier. Large tank is a plus. It can fit under the kitchen faucet for a refill even when the sink is full of dishes, thanks to its shape. Mist is very fine, you can set it to high without soaking things. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: David and Kait

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of this product. Both of them ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of this product. Both of them broke within two weeks of gentle use. I was able to use parts from the 1st and the 2nd to get an extra two weeks of use before I ordered a different product from a different company. The parts were cheap and poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: BBAmy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the dry air in winter and raised the humidity in my bedroom from 10% to 40%. Given how dry it is, I need to refill it every two days. Very quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Positive
customer_reviews.text: Best ever, puts out mist, now consideriting, hot vs cold....no difference, once the vapor hits the air it’s cold.....wouldn’t make a judgment on that cold vs hot it’s all gonna vaporize to cool air, but I like the output of vapor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to clean it yet, buttons and knobs are a bit unintuitive in the dark. Works nice though, bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Weiand

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier, does NOT last 100 hours
customer_reviews.text: Great humidifier, does NOT last 100 hours. I have to refill this once every 4-5 days and I only turn it on when I sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Nerderman

customer_reviews.title: I really like the fact that the silver clean technology works to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second H1510 Humidifier I have purchased. I really like the fact that the silver clean technology works to combat mold and mildew. It really works. The first one I bought lived up to the 100 hour promise so I purchased this unit from Amazon for a much lower price! This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C Knops

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further! This is the one you want if you are looking for a portable ultrasonic humidifier. It is quiet, not a sound while it is on so it won't disturb you, mist is so fine it doesn't saturate your furniture even when you put it on high. Nightlite is a soothing blue which you can turn off if you want to. Do not gamble buying a cheaper one, for the price this does it all. Although I only wanted a cold humidifier this has a warm mist feature also. Do not understand why some gave it a negative review. I give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Domenica

customer_reviews.title: NOT A WARM MIST HUMIDIFIER!
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading description. When you place on the warm setting it just generates more mist but it is just as cold as the cool setting, as others have mentioned here.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Does not run continuous for 100 hours.
customer_reviews.text: I like the humidifier, but it does not run continuous for 100 hours as advertised. I can only run it for about 16 or 20 hours, and then I have to refill it.. I am running it on cool and low output of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: ARTIST

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: After a month of constant use, it still runs quiet and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: It had a temp setting but never got warm.
customer_reviews.text: It had a temp setting but never got warm. We've tried many different humidifiers and this is the only one we never seemed to notice any effect from
customer_reviews.author: A. Bakken

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier works well.
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, easy to refill. I've only had it 2 months, though. Time will tell....
customer_reviews.author: CO shopper

customer_reviews.title: I finally bought this one & I LOVE IT! I have allergies year round so this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a humidifier for a while & did a lot of research online & read A LOT of reviews. I wanted one with the cool/warm mist... I finally bought this one & I LOVE IT! I have allergies year round so this is a big help with breathing. My husband also loves it. I would highly recommend it.... it is quite & the nightlight is a plus & is a soft blue light.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my bedroom. Love it because it is quiet, works quickly and there is no heating element or filters to worry about. Pretty easy to fill and last for a day without refill. Nice size for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: LolieMess

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I wish you could use essential oils in it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Carter

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year!
customer_reviews.text: Started leaking water from the vents on the side after using for just 1 winter. Did not shut off automatically like he manual says!
customer_reviews.author: Jenine M Webb

customer_reviews.title: Bad white powder all over.
customer_reviews.text: Had a very bad problem with white powder covered all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: Gamal Mikhail

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and easy to clean. No problems at all in the two months we've had it
customer_reviews.author: slbotto

customer_reviews.title: and was not as happy, as I am with this brand
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one, used it for a while, and then ordered a second one, for another part of the house. I have tried several others, over the years, and was not as happy, as I am with this brand. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy A.

customer_reviews.title: No water light malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 2 months. Stopped using for a little while. Used again and red - no water light comes on; shuts down, when there is still half a tank.
customer_reviews.author: pk

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, best I have seen compared to many others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item and recommended to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Quite, last for hours and especially overnight. Water does not leak when turned off like all other humidifiers. Great features with night light and adjustable knob for output of mist.
customer_reviews.author: dailyselections

customer_reviews.title: and like the other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: This works as promised, and like the other reviewers, I am impressed by how quietly the unit runs. We have a smaller unit as well by this company and they are very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted to LOVE this humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked WONDERFULLY for us for a whole 4 days after we received it and then just stopped working so I returned it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Loves To Travel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of use it started to say it was out of water and shut off even with a full tank. I've had to prop it at an angle to fix this. Pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Harmon

customer_reviews.title: The fine spray from this machine is more pleasant than any ...
customer_reviews.text: The fine spray from this machine is more pleasant than any other humidifier we have had, We use it 24 hours /day
customer_reviews.author: James D. Blum

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertisied
customer_reviews.text: Our PureGuardian simply does the job as advertised. We've had our unit for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Macey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better humidifers on the market. Easy to fill and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marcin

customer_reviews.title: Helps us with our sinuses
customer_reviews.text: We use this most nights and it does help my wife and me and our sinuses. The warm mist seems cooler than what we consider warm, but all-in-all we like this unit.
customer_reviews.author: tomwoodsv

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for a couple months. It has ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple months. It has started to leak once the tank is about 1/4th full, but not when it is fuller then that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This humidifier is very good, however
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is very good, however, at even the lowest setting, it has to be refilled after about 2 1/2 days, very short of the 100 hours it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: evkvs

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has a cool and warm setting
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a cool and warm setting. Night lite and a little too bright. Wish it had a remote and it would be almost perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used once, do not know how well the product will do over time.
customer_reviews.author: Juana C Powell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really great humidifer however 100 hours is a very large stretch. I would say 12 hours is more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Phishgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The warm mist never worked and the cool must only works intermittently. The sensor for the water level doesn't work well and the humidifier turns off because it thinks it's out of water even when the tank is full.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Veilleux

customer_reviews.title: So and so
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with it - sometimes it stops pretending that it's out of water when it's actually quite full.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: So far--great
customer_reviews.text: Expensive yet appears after 30 days use to be worth the money. Quiet, efficent and easy to use, good product
customer_reviews.author: roberta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This machine work great and love the night light. The seller was prompt and on time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: sam-chiem

customer_reviews.title: First let me say this is a good ultrasonic humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! First let me say this is a good ultrasonic humidifier. The down side and to me, this is big! This in no way shape or form operates 100 hours on a full tank of water. At it's lowest setting and on cool mist, 36hrs tops. Heads up to the newbies when buying an ultrasonic humidifier. The only remedy for white dust, is distilled water or a demineralization cartridge. Tablets don't work. Thanks for your time!
customer_reviews.author: Azzurri66

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not sure if working. other used to leave water on the floor. this one evaporates?
customer_reviews.author: trustory

customer_reviews.title: Works the best for my household and shall do the same for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works the best for my household and shall do the same for any other household. Lives up to its name Pure Guardian.
customer_reviews.author: Anamika

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet operation
customer_reviews.text: Nice and quiet operation. Wish the unit was easier to refill. All in all a good purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased - but does not really get warm.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the unit. The mist is very strong and does the job. It's easy to fill and clean. However, as others have stated, the mist foes not get warm. It's room temp at best when on the warm setting. I decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: NAE

customer_reviews.title: Whatever is powering the steam doesn't seem to be strong ...
customer_reviews.text: Whatever is powering the steam doesn't seem to be strong enough as the water kind of falls and gets furniture wet.
customer_reviews.author: jean griffin borho

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I have no filters to change and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I have no filters to change and do not need to add any chemicals to the water.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Whisper quiet humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these at a yard sale and really like it. So when I needed an additional unit, there was no question as to which brand I would buy. One fyi: be sure to purchase the available filter. You will need it unless you use distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: Darneil Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Snoring was a big problem here. Since using this humidifier nighttime is much quieter here.
customer_reviews.author: mom4bam

customer_reviews.title: White Dust!
customer_reviews.text: Had big problems with white dust. Bought a filter. Still white dust all over the furniture.Can only use it with distilled water. Kind of disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dee M. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This works like a dream. It helps us get through these dry winters.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: holds just the right amount of water to last for a couple nights
customer_reviews.author: book junkie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If it's not completely filled up it's hard to get it to work when you start it.
customer_reviews.author: meltedamerican

customer_reviews.title: It has to be turned upside down and doesn't have a good way to hold on to it
customer_reviews.text: Awkward and difficult to fill with water. It has to be turned upside down and doesn't have a good way to hold on to it. Definitely a major design flaw. DON'T BUY IT.
customer_reviews.author: MayaAbq

customer_reviews.title: More than disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a quality humidifier, however, it does not stay on? It goes for a while and shuts off? The room I have it in is quite small but has a pellet stove which makes the air very dry. I need a humidifier that stays on. More than disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and early delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what we wanted and works great. Arrived ahead of schedule which was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Debra G. Battani

customer_reviews.title: No MISTake. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Machine is quiet and holds enough water for two nights of a strong and steady stream of mist. Love the blue soft light that illuminates the room but doesn't disturb sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Samuel

customer_reviews.title: A Sound Investment
customer_reviews.text: I too read the reviews and did some research before having purchased this unit. So far this item has exceeded my original expectations. The tank is easy to remove and fill with water. The warm and cool mist options on the unit are fabulous. Compact and stylish which makes it perfect for my end table next to the bed. Unit is extremely quiet and low water indicator light is a nice touch. All and all this item is super feature friendly and I would highly recommend to anyone considering a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GEO

customer_reviews.title: poorly made, already broken
customer_reviews.text: This has already broken, 6 months, really? can it be that poorly made?
customer_reviews.author: grisha coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Best humidifier ever. I have owned many and this is an easy refill and definitely easy to clean. The large tank means less refills too!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: a quality product
customer_reviews.text: no one should buy any other humidifier. pricey i know. they run and run and run. i have one on in the winter 24 hours a day 7 days a week. i bought two and the both still work even after years of abuse and poor care.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: I love how well this humidifier works when it is actually ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how well this humidifier works when it is actually working. It costs way to too much to have to replace it as much as we have. Two in two years is ridiculous. And when i tell you i am careful, i am careful. This gets wiped down nightly and we only use distilled water. I've never used harsh chemicals and only use the little brush that comes with it or paper towels. I just think if you are going to make a product and sell it for this much, it should last for more than a year or two. The first one broke in less than a year. I'm switching brands. Not happy at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: had for a couple of months...very quiet...has green indicator lights that are bright in a small bedroom. use distilled water.
customer_reviews.author: michele

product_meta.title: Pure Guardian H1510 Ultrasonic Warm and Cool Mist Humidifier, 100 Hrs. Run Time, 1.5 Gal. Tank Capacity, 630 Sq. Ft. Coverage, Large Rooms, Quiet, Filter Free, Treated Tank Resists Mold
product_meta.description: The 100-hour Ultrasonic Warm and Cool Mist Humidifier guards against problems caused by dry air in the home. It features an easy to fill large 1.5-gallon tank, ideal for use in medium sized rooms. Cleanliness matters! Unlike other humidifiers that grow slimy mold on the water tank surface, Silver Clean Protection is embedded in the tank to fight the growth of mold and mildew on the surface of the water tank. Thanks to ultrasonic technology, it disperses a fine mist into the air, and is ultra-quiet, making it ideal to have on while you sleep. The humidifier is equipped with the option for warm or cool mist, a night-light and variable mist control. A low water indicator light lets you know when it's time to refill the water tank. PureGuardian humidifiers create a better home environment for those suffering from colds, allergies and dry skin. It is important to only use GENUINE Guardian Technologies replacement parts to maintain product performance.
feature_bullets: WARM AND COOL MIST HUMIDIFIER: The PureGuardian H1510 ultrasonic cool mist humidifier guards against dry air in the home, perfect for those with colds, allergies and dry skin; The easy fill 1.5 gallon tank covers 630 sq. ft. rooms and runs up to 100 hours
SILVER CLEAN PROTECTED TANK: Silver Clean Protection fights the growth of slimy mold and mildew on the surface of the water tank a common problem with traditional humidifiers

ULTRASONIC TECHNOLOGY: The H1510 disperses a soothing, cool mist into the air and is ultra quiet, making it ideal to have on while you sleep; The compact size makes it great for tabletops or bedside nightstands

ADDITIONAL FEATURES: No evaporating pads, wicks or filters to clean or replace, warm or cool humidification, variable spray control, low water indicator light, soft glow night light, multi directional mist, auto shut off when tank is empty

PureGuardian: by Guardian Technologies offers a full range of small appliance based solutions for happier and healthier lives at home, focused on creating powerful, safe and innovative technologies to help facilitate healthier, happier home environments

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
